metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0318 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Movable Type before 4.38, 5.0x before 5.07, and 5.1x before 5.13 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving templates, a different issue than CVE-2012-1262.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0318` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
